Fast CV Detection for Cold Atom Cloud Experiments

Computer vision models delivering ~80× speedup for cold atom cloud detection; large-scale cloud training workflow.

Related preprint Github

Stack: Computer Vision, PyTorch, GCP, Data Pipelines

Built and trained CV models for detecting cold atom clouds for quantum experimentation, scaling training and processing over large datasets (30+ TB).

Focus areas:

  • High-throughput inference
  • Robust training + evaluation workflows
  • Cloud-based data and training management
